title: Watch: An incredible 107-shot rally in a singles badminton match at Tokyo 2020 Paralympics
content: Video courtesy: Paralympic Games#Tokyo2020 In #Badminton action, an incredible 107-shot rally in a men's singles SL3 match (half court). Note: The #INA shuttler is 51 years old while the Japanese shuttler has a prosthetic leg.
